sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-dialog
    v-model="dialogDeleteStudent"
    max-width="400"
    persistent
  >
    <!-- <template v-slot:activator="{ props: activatorProps }">
      <v-btn v-bind="activatorProps">
        <v-icon
          class="ml-4"
          size="small"
        >
          mdi-delete
        </v-icon>
      </v-btn>
    </template> -->
    <v-card
      prepend-icon="mdi-delete"
      title="APAGAR ALUNO"
    >
      <template v-slot:text>
        <v-progress-linear
          v-if="loading"
          color="#008ABD"
          indeterminate
        />
        Tem certeza que deseja apagar o aluno {{ studentName }}
      </template>
      <template v-slot:actions>
        <v-spacer></v-spacer>
        <v-btn
          :disabled="loading"
          @click="close"
        >
          Cancela
        </v-btn>
        <v-btn
          :disabled="loading"  
          @click="deleteStudentConfirm"
        >
          Salvar
        </v-btn>
      </template>
    </v-card>
  </v-dialog>
</template>
<script>
  import api from '@/api/api';
  export default {
  name: 'DeleteStudents',

  props: {
    studentId: {
      type: Number,
      default: null
    },
    studentName: {
      type: String,
      default: ''
    },
    dialogDeleteStudent: {
      type: Boolean,
      default: false
    }
  },

  data: () => ({
    loading: false,
    name: ''
  }),

  computed: {
  },

  watch: {
    // dialog () {
    //   if (this.dialog === false) {
    //     this.$emit('close')
    //   }
    // }
  },
  // created () {
  // },

  methods: {
    close () {
      this.$emit('close')
    },
    async deleteStudentConfirm () {
      this.loading = true
      try {
        await api.deleteStudent(this.studentId)
        this.$emit('reload')
        this.loading = false
        this.$emit('close')
      } catch (e) {
        this.loading = false
        console.log(e)
      }
    }
  }
}
</script>
